text: I have 10+ years of IT expreanse. I can handle a lot of stress and i am good at multitasking. I like a good challenge and enjoy learning new things. I am a Java microservice, Angular and Devops (Full Stack Developer). Currently i'm learning to use React, Node.js and Express. As part of my daily work I use git in my projects. I recently rediscovered my love for making websites, service building and automating everything, i'm currently looking for a job that will allow me to become a better DevOps Full Stack developer. And i'd like to work 8 hours each day doing something i enjoy and something that is always challenging rather than wasting my time on jobs i don't enjoy. I'd like to work at a place surrounded by people i can always learn from, so i can ultimately become a better  Full Stack developer.
